Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.
Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
Do not go gentle into that good night but rage, rage against the dying of the light.
You can't help getting older, but you don't have to get old.
Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.
I'm happy to report that my inner child is still ageless.
True terror is to wake up one morning and discover that your high school class is running the country.
As I grow older, I pay less attention to what men say. I just watch what they do.
Forty is the old age of youth; fifty the youth of old age.
Youth is wasted on the young.
Old age is like everything else. To make a success of it, you've got to start young.
Old age, believe me, is a good and pleasant thing. It is true you are gently shouldered off the stage, but then you are given such a comfortable front stall as spectator.
The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age.
The old believe everything, the middle-aged suspect everything, the young know everything.
You are as young as your self-confidence, as old as your fears; as young as your hope, as old as your despair.
A diplomat is a man who always remembers a woman's birthday but never remembers her age.
It is not how old you are, but how you are old.
Every man desires to live long, but no man wishes to be old.
Old age is no place for sissies.

There is a fountain of youth: it is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will truly have defeated age.
Age is not important unless you're a cheese.
The closing years of life are like the end of a masquerade party, when the masks are dropped.
A man growing old becomes a child again.
Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
A grownup is a child with layers on.
We are always the same age inside.
The trick is growing up without growing old.
Alas, after a certain age every man is responsible for his face.
Thirty was so strange for me. I've really had to come to terms with the fact that I am now a walking and talking adult.
Just remember, once you're over the hill you begin to pick up speed.
Age does not protect you from love. But love, to some extent, protects you from age.
What most persons consider as virtue, after the age of 40 is simply a loss of energy.
None are so old as those who have outlived enthusiasm.
Old minds are like old horses; you must exercise them if you wish to keep them in working order.
Age is a very high price to pay for maturity.
Old age is like a plane flying through a storm. Once you're aboard, there's nothing you can do.
Be on the alert to recognize your prime at whatever time of your life it may occur.
Nature gives you the face you have at twenty; it is up to you to merit the face you have at fifty.
In youth, the days are short and the years are long. In old age, the years are short and days long.

Probably the happiest period in life most frequently is in middle age, when the eager passions of youth are cooled, and the infirmities of age not yet begun; as we see that the shadows, which are at morning and evening so large, almost entirely disappear at midday.
Inflation is when you pay fifteen dollars for the ten-dollar haircut you used to get for five dollars when you had hair.
You know you're getting old when all the names in your black book have M. D. after them.
Growing old is no more than a bad habit which a busy person has no time to form.
Oh rage! Oh despair! Oh age, my enemy!
Age does not protect you from love. But love, to some extent, protects you from age.
The great secret that all old people share is that you really haven't changed in seventy or eighty years. Your body changes, but you don't change at all. And that, of course, causes great confusion.

Surrounding myself with beautiful women keeps me young.
No one can avoid aging, but aging productively is something else.

I don't feel old. I don't feel anything till noon. That's when it's time for my nap.
Age merely shows what children we remain.
As men get older, the toys get more expensive.
Those who love deeply never grow old; they may die of old age, but they die young.
You don't stop laughing because you grow older. You grow older because you stop laughing.
